---
title: "Memo Title"
author: "Your Name"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output:
  arsedown::pdf_memo:
    smolhead:         true
    smolcaps:         true
    keep_md:          true
    keep_tex:         true
    number_sections: false
    toc:             false
    toc_depth:           2
    self_contained:     no
fontfamily: mathptmx # provides Times with Times math -- prior to 0.4.0 this was `fourier`, providing Utopia with Fourier math
fontsize: 11pt # or try 10pt and `geometry: margin=1in`
geometry: top=0.55in, bottom=0.55in, left=0.65in, right=0.65in
subparagraph: true
linkcolor: blue
urlcolor: teal
bibliography:
  - "`r system.file('include', 'arsenoff.bib', package = 'arsedown')`"
csl: "`r arsedown::space_csl()`"
knit: (function(input_file, encoding, ...) {rmarkdown::render(input_file, encoding=encoding, output_dir=getwd(), clean=FALSE)})
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.width       = 7,
  fig.height      = 4,
  fig.pos         = "!b",
  fig.align       = "center",
  dev             = "png",
  dpi             = 300,
  out.extra       = "",
  eval            = TRUE,
  echo            = FALSE,
  include         = FALSE,
  message         = FALSE,
  warning         = FALSE,
  error           = FALSE,
  progress        = FALSE,
  results         = "asis"
)
```
